pullrequest.title: Update gtest to 1.7.0 to fix osx 10.9 build (#36)

content.html:
In my Saucy chroot there is a new compiler warrning:

In file included from /root/sdformat/test/gtest/include/gtest/internal/gtest-internal.h:40:0,
                 from /root/sdformat/test/gtest/include/gtest/gtest.h:58,
                 from /root/sdformat/test/gtest/src/gtest-all.cc:39:
/root/sdformat/test/gtest/include/gtest/internal/gtest-port.h:1390:79: warning: missing initializer for member 'testing::internal::MutexBase::owner_' [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
     ::testing::internal::MutexBase mutex = { PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER, false }
                                                                               ^
